mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM ( NO , MEMBER_NO , COMMUNITY_TYPE_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN , MODIFY_DATE , HIT , PICK_YN ) VALUES ( 10 , 1 , 1 , #{title} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' , SYSDATE , 100 , 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT NO , COMMUNITY_TYPE_NO , #{title} , MEMBER_NO , TO_CHAR(#{enrollDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , HIT FROM COMM
